main event: Three witnesses observed a white and yellow light dropping down and disappearing in Springdale, Ohio, on August 8, 1966.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 20-30 seconds.,The light was accompanied by a buzzing sound.,One witness compared the object to a spaceship seen on television.,Observers described the object's motion as dropping down and then vanishing.,No physical evidence or photographs were collected.
witness description: civilians observing an unidentified aerial phenomenon
